greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A054525 * (A010051 * 0^(n-k)), 1<=k<=n.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A054525 * A010051, 1<=k<=n. A054525 = the Mobius transform. A010051 * 0^(n-k) = an infinite lower triangular matrix with A010051, the characteristic function of the primes (0, 1, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1,...) as the main diagonal and the rest zeros.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 22 2008
